case_vignette: A 14-year-old male with history of    leukemia treated with chemotherapy underwent hematopoietic stem cell transplant and on day 30 post therapy was noted to have    a rash o   n the trunk that rapidly spread to th e hands, feet, ear   s. Patient was also reported to have fev ers, chills, diarrhea and new transaminitis.  Examination remarkable for acral erythema a   nd scattered pink erythematous macules and poo rly demarcated papules on the trunk, extremities with prominent follicular erythema.
question: What is the final diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have a rash on my trunk that has spread to my hands, feet, and ears, along with fevers, chills, and diarrhea.
How long have you been experiencing these symptoms?
I've been experiencing these symptoms since day 30 post my therapy.
What specific therapy did you undergo 30 days ago?
I underwent a hematopoietic stem cell transplant.
Have you experienced similar symptoms before your recent therapy?
No, I have not experienced these symptoms before my recent therapy.
Do you have any known allergies or autoimmune conditions?
I have a history of leukemia.
Have any medications been prescribed to you following your stem cell transplant?
I do not have information about specific medications prescribed following the stem cell transplant.
Final Diagnosis: Graft-versus-host disease (GVHD)
